PNP chief Gamboa orders deployment of SAF commandos in NCR to help enforce 'intensified' ECQ tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-734937 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/734937/pnp-chief-gamboa-orders-deployment-of-saf-commandos-in-ncr-to-help-enforce-intensified-ecq/story/ Philippine National Police chief Police General Archie Francisco Gamboa on Tuesday ordered the deployment of members of the elite Special Action Force in the National Capital Region to assist in the implementation of the enhanced community quarantine. Tue, 21 Apr 2020 15:49:04 +0800
Gamboa says COVID-infected PNP personnel now at 74 tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-734938 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/734938/gamboa-says-covid-infected-pnp-personnel-now-at-74/story/ The number of Philippine National Police (PNP) personnel infected with coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) rose to 74, PNP chief Police General Archie Francisco Gamboa said Tuesday. Tue, 21 Apr 2020 15:41:40 +0800
Arrest of Cebu artist, businesswoman over Facebook post illegal -FLAG tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-734936 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/734936/flag-arrest-of-cebu-artist-businesswoman-over-facebook-post-illegal/story/ The warrantless arrest of an artist and businesswoman from Cebu City over a Facebook post that police considered "fake news" was illegal, a group of human rights lawyers said Tuesday. Tue, 21 Apr 2020 15:37:32 +0800
Advisory on funding to address gender violence to be issued tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-734935 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/734935/advisory-on-funding-to-address-gender-violence-to-be-issued-duterte/story/ The Philippine Commission on Women will soon issue an advisory to all local government units (LGUs) on the use of their respective gender and development funding for cases of gender-based violence during the enhanced community quarantine (ECQ). Tue, 21 Apr 2020 15:31:11 +0800
No recommendation for total lockdown from health experts consulted by Duterte -Palace tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-734930 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/734930/no-recommendation-for-total-lockdown-from-health-experts-consulted-by-duterte-palace/story/ “Walang nagrekomenda ng total lockdown. Ang naging rekomendasyon lamang ay i-maintain, i-relax, i-lift ang ECQ sa iba t ibang lugar depende nga sa kaso ng COVID-19,” presidential spokesperson Harry Roque said in a televised briefing. Tue, 21 Apr 2020 15:08:49 +0800
48-hour 'hard lockdown' on Sampaloc to start April 23 -Isko tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-734929 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/metro/734929/48-hour-hard-lockdown-on-sampaloc-to-start-april-23/story/ Manila Mayor Isko Moreno will put Sampaloc District under 48-hour "hard lockdown" later this week due to the high number of COVID-19 cases there. Tue, 21 Apr 2020 15:07:43 +0800
Number of ECQ violators now at 136,517, says PNP chief Gamboa tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-734926 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/734926/number-of-ecq-violators-now-at-136-517-says-pnp-chief-gamboa/story/ Of the total number of violators, PNP chief Police General Archie Francisco Gamboa said 99,986 have been warned by authorities, more or less 6,000 were fined, and around 31,000 were arrested by authorities. Gamboa said most violators in Metro Manila were recorded by the Southern Police District followed by the Northern Police District, Eastern Police District and Manila Police District. Tue, 21 Apr 2020 14:57:40 +0800
Minimum number of tested individuals achievable by May 15 -Rep. Salceda tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-734925 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/734925/minimum-number-of-tested-individuals-achievable-by-may-15-rep-salceda/story/ Albay Representative Joey Salceda believes the minimum number of individuals tested for possible COVID-19 infection is achievable by May 15, as he pushes for another two-week extension of the Luzon-wide enhanced community quarantine. Tue, 21 Apr 2020 14:47:12 +0800
CHR condemns rising online sexual harassment vs. women amid COVID-19 pandemic tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-734922 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/734922/condemns-rising-online-sexual-harassment-vs-women-amid-covid-19-pandemic/story/ Sexual harassment against women online has become prevalent amid the enhanced community quarantine due to COVID-19, the Commission on Human Rights said. Tue, 21 Apr 2020 14:43:32 +0800
Jailed frat member in Atio Castillo hazing case asks court for temporary release due to COVID-19 fears tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-734923 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/734923/jailed-frat-member-in-atio-castillo-hazing-case-asks-court-for-temporary-release-due-to-covid-19-fears/story/ One of the fraternity members accused of killing law student Horacio "Atio" Castillo III in 2017 has asked a Manila court for his temporary release on humanitarian grounds as the coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) threatens Philippine jails. Tue, 21 Apr 2020 14:34:55 +0800
Two US warships in South China Sea amid China-Malaysia standoff tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-734920 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/734920/two-us-warships-in-south-china-sea-amid-china-malaysia-standoff/story/ Rear Admiral Fred Kacher, commander of the USS America Expeditionary Strike Group, told Reuters that his forces had interacted with Chinese naval forces in the South China Sea this week. "All our interactions continue to be safe and professional with them," Kacher said in a telephone interview from the USS America. Tue, 21 Apr 2020 14:07:32 +0800
Teachers' 13th month pay ready for release by May 15 --DepEd tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-734918 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/734918/teachers-13th-month-pay-ready-for-release-by-may-15-deped/story/ “Ang ating 13th month pay ay atin na rin pong pinoproseso at ready na rin po for release by May 15,” Education Undersecretary for Finance Annalyn Sevilla said in a televised press briefing. Tue, 21 Apr 2020 13:58:47 +0800
Arevalo: 23 AFP personnel recovered from COVID-19; 10 still in hospital tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-734916 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/734916/arevalo-23-afp-personnel-recovered-from-covid-19-10-still-in-hospital/story/ "Sa ngayon po ang natitira na lamang po na naka-confine sa ating hospital ay sampu na lang ano, there are already 23 of them na nagpositibo, lahat ito ay magaling na, fully-recovered at nakabalik na sa kani-kanilang trabaho," military spokesman Brigadier General Edgard Arevalo said during the Laging Handa press briefing. Tue, 21 Apr 2020 13:56:28 +0800
NWRB: Enough water in Angat Dam to supply Metro Manila until May tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-734915 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/metro/734915/nwrb-enough-water-in-angat-dam-to-supply-metro-manila-until-may/story/ "With the current allocation of 46 cubic meters per second, there is sufficient supply until the end of the ECQ and even until the month of May prior to the onset of the rainy season," NWRB executive director Sevillo David said in a mobile message. Tue, 21 Apr 2020 13:45:04 +0800
DILG chief Año: Condo owners cannot make their own rules tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-734912 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/734912/dilg-chief-ano-condo-owners-cannot-make-their-own-rules/story/ Interior Secretary Eduardo Año on Tuesday said owners of condominiums should respect law enforcers and strictly follow guidelines in the enhanced community quarantine, noting that they could not enforce their own rules and regulations in this period of health crisis. Tue, 21 Apr 2020 13:36:05 +0800
